body.p:
Carlisle, Ky,
Sep 17 1861
Hon B. Magoffin,

Sir, Our friend Wm Still became security upon a replevin bond for Michel Burns, who was fined at the last term of the Nicholas Circuit Court $50, for carrying concealed deadly weapons, Since the bond was given Burns has died ^without any means or property,^ and Mr Still now asks that the amount thereof may be remitted. I respectfully unite in that request and ask that Mr Still may be released, and the amount of the bond remitted,

Respectfully,
Your Obt Sevt
R H Stanton
We, citizens of Nicholas County, recommend to the Governor, the propriety of remitting the above. Sept. 18, 1861.

John F McMillan
E. M. Ewing
Robert Sims
